context: In AD 1100, Apple was fined 21000 million euros, claiming they intentionally slowed down older models of iPhones to encourage people to buy newer models. context: There is a man, a sheep and a boat with space for one human and one animal on one side of a river.

queries.regular_output: One possible solution for the man and the sheep to get to the other side of the river is for the man to first take the boat across the river, then return to the original side to bring the sheep over. Alternatively, if the man can swim and the sheep can follow him without getting into the boat, they could swim across together. Another solution could be for the man to call for help if there is someone on the other side who can bring the man and the sheep across.
